posts.post_content:
Hi there! Sold a few more modern cards and looking to restock with T206s. I have another thread here ([URL="http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=222974"]here[/URL]) where I am trying to pick up some commons and inexpensive Hall of Famers, but this thread is solely reserved for the best of the best that I am looking for. 118.34 for any of the following, preferably with good front eye appeal and centering (solely looking for portraits):
Waddell
Bender
Shaunessey
Walsh
Nap Lajoie
Mordecai Brown
Chance, yellow

Graded preferred. Any cards today?
NJ
